text: Rizza is an Italian surname that may refer to *Audrey La Rizza (born 1981), French judoka *Gilda dalla Rizza (1892–1975), Italian soprano *Giovanni Battista Rizza (born 1924), Italian mathematician *Giuseppe Rizza (1987–2020), Italian football defender *Manfredi Rizza (born 1991), Italian canoeist *Margaret Rizza (born 1929), English composer, primarily of church music Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Rizza (surname)
